name: Johan Spa Hotel

reviews.text: Very interesting interior decoration decision - in each room one of the walls and ceiling are not decorated at all, and are left of naked concred, as from construction step. Rooms looks very romantic. Hotel itself is very peaceful and quiet. Spa centre is small, but offers wide range of different procedures of very good value. The hotel is not so easy to find in small streets of Kuressaare, but location itself is ok - just a short stroll from town centre. Buffet breakfast was simple, but tasty.
reviews.title: Concrete walls

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have spent several vaccations in Kuressaare and Johan Spa is definitely one of the nicest boutique Spa's in the city. It has a central location, nice modern design rooms and a small pool area. I definitely also recommend to rent the top floor private sauna and terrace jakuzi.
reviews.title: One of best places in Kuressaare

likes.disliked: — Could be perhaps even smaller and closer to the beaches.

aka: Johan Spa Hotel Kuressaare, Saaremaa, Estonia
